Juicy Drop Pop comes in five cool and delicious flavours including Blue Rebel, Berry Bomb, Knock Out Punch, Blue Raspberry Watermelon Blast, and Apple Attack. The Juicy Drop Pop is a double dose of awesome sweetness!

Blue Rebel: citric acid, buffered lactic acid, artificial flavour, glycerine, potassium sorbate (preservative), blue 1. entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfetti Van Melle
Type: Candy
Price: 11.50

The Best of Creamy, Cola and Fruit Lollipops

This retro lollipop is perhaps the most popular in the world! The Chupa Chups Lollipop is sold in over 150 countries! 

An old fashioned lollipop that came out in Spain during the 1950s. The Chupa Chups Lollipop logo was designed by the great Spanish artist, Salvadore Dali.  With just one taste you'll know these lollipops are pure art, from the packaging to the delicious variety of awesome fruity flavours. 
Don't just carry the average lollipop in your store when you can have the most delicious lollipop in the world! Stock your candy aisles with Chupa Chups Lollipops!
